title: Talking Dems - Marianne Williamson Takes Questions from The Daily Show Audience
itunes:title: Talking Dems - Marianne Williamson Takes Questions from The Daily Show Audience
description:
2020 Democratic presidential candidate Marianne Williamson answers audience members’ questions about reproductive rights, virulent racism in the U.S. and hyper partisanship.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
